title: Don't worry people, solo queue is coming soonâ„¢

replies.body:
Meanwhile me I like Dynamic Queue even if I play Solo...
http://www.nowcultured.com/images/2013/07/30-funny-detail-pics-in-spongebob/14-spongebob-lost-identity-coffee-shop.png
me too I love the fact that I can choose my position.

That is just part of new champ select
Dynamic is the Queue with more people thing
I was not aware thank you, but even so I find it a good way to challenge myself because there is always a due queue on the other team.
do you enjoy playing against premade teams of 4 or 5?
Have yet to run into those unless I myself am in a group of 4 or 5
well thats why :P just wait til your in your promos and you get a group when your stuck with trolls and afkers
honestly I don't mind when there is a team on the enemy team, That just means if one of them tilt all 3,4,5 of them are going to tilt

It's usually toxic to the game though from what I've seen. The premades will all gank one lane and ignore their other lanes. Sometimes this wins the game, sometimes it loses it, but either way the enemies and allies usually don't have fun lol. But sometimes you get people who simply queue together to avoid those random feeders or AFKers which is fine.
I honestly queue to make sure my support and jungle have a brain

Yeah that's how I do it too. Plus I just hate playing alone, everybody's so rude and toxic to everybody else that I like to have at least one person I can trust not to be an ass. Me and my friends don't even use skype or anything when we play in a premade. But, I understand a lot of people do use voice communication.
Well I barely play Ranked so theres that, maybe once a weak so it will be awhile till my promos

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wGm0w07E,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-05-31T14:57:38.521+0000)
>
> Meanwhile me I like Dynamic Queue even if I play Solo...
> http://www.nowcultured.com/images/2013/07/30-funny-detail-pics-in-spongebob/14-spongebob-lost-identity-coffee-shop.png

Being able to secure roles before the champion selection is good, I like that feature as well, the problem of DQ is just keep placing solo players against full premade teams.

Clarifying, since you have an error.

Securing rolls is not DQ, that's the new champ select. DQ is queuing into ranked with 3+ people in the party, and nothing else.
I feel you buddy.
http://i.imgur.com/sL1se0g.gif?noredirect

That's ok, I don't need it anyway....
http://i.imgur.com/dxQZXYF.gif?Noredirect

I neeeeeed it

https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7qE8oQMvMIzEuC0U/giphy.gif

Rito pls!
https://67.media.tumblr.com/fa4a9e5169a581ed7e50f5f38f6c7ab2/tumblr_inline_modeh9Tns61qz4rgp.gif
They've just confirmed it'll never get back. Riot excels again.

You know, not to raise anyone's hopes, but i got an e-mail from rito asking if the idea of having a solo queue option (simply being no groups of people can join) right next to the party option was a good idea. And i said yah, people will like you more if you do that.

The Master and Buttercup... +1
When you solo queue and your whole team dc, because they play in a internet Cafe... {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Yeah because thats so likely, i mean that happens practically every game.

Few people will discover the trademark. Those who do, might not know what it even meant. Perhaps after the second look they will see, but, the older gents/ladies will just have to wait. As we always do. As we always will.
http://hellshammers.net/uploads/monthly_2015_11/tumblr_lqcycaRyic1qbz2auo1_500.png.64e0f4db41f1baa4a005d7006bb01668.png
Lol this came before their announcement.
Lol yeah it came a few hours before.
And i'm here, waiting for Season 17 when the kids stop complaining about their Bronze matchmaking and blaming DynamicQ for it.
Guys you can't trust rito. They lie all the time :        ^)

Not anymore.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dynamic-queue-and-future-league

And now Riot confirmed there will be no Solo Queue.

https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/myo23mjmwludqtt9hbab.GIF

We all knew deep down this was going to happen.
Where?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dynamic-queue-and-future-league

Around the start of the vid.
LIFE IS PAIN! Anyone who says otherwise is selling something. :D

At this point its not about solo q but how Riot is handling its players. Once in blue moon whole community said its a bad idea and that they don't want it. Riot basically said that they know its bad but they will put it in, fix it till we like it and everything is gonna be fine.

That's even worse from straight middle finger.

Fish y u do dis QQ  And just when draft is down for maintenance too...
I just want an update...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 
They should just dash our hopes now instead of leaving us on a string.
I miss staying up playing ranked when I didn't have work.

Edit: Finally gave us an answer.  Psychic Fish?
